headline.main: Fort Lamy Garrison Is Strengthened -- Air Links to Distant Fronts Are Stressed -- Foreign Legion Groups Join de Gaulle

lead_paragraph: FORT LAMY, Chad Territory, French Equatorial Africa, Oct. 13 -- This town, Chad's capital, is a scattering of mud huts and even more primitive dwellings constructed of bamboo. Their thatched roofs are either oblong or conical.
abstract: French Equatorial Africa war role discussed
